dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
no_username, Jul-09 10:34 pm (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am an authorized representative of the copyright owner.
Copyright owner's full name: [REDACTED]
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: manager

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Beverly Hills
State/Province: ca
Postal code: 90212
Country: USA
Phone number(optional): n/a
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: This email is to advise you that you are accommodating  the unauthorized distribution of copyrighted and protected material on your website located at:

http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889878749356032
http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889875616219136

To facilitate the unauthorized downloading of the SKOLD release 'ANOMIE' is in direct violation of copyright law. The remedies available under the U.S. Copyright Act and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act are severe, including injunctive relief, payment of statutorily-prescribed damages, and reimbursement of attorney's fees. If you do not immediately remove the links to the copyrighted material and notify us that you have done so, we will promptly pursue legal action. We require the links to the copyrighted material to be removed from your website, and expect a response within no more than 2 days. Thank you for your immediate action on this matter. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[REDACTED]

Reported Twitter account: rockmetalbrasil
Description of Infringement: This email is to advise you that you are accommodating  the unauthorized distribution of copyrighted and protected material on your website located at:

http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889878749356032
http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889875616219136

To facilitate the unauthorized downloading of the SKOLD release 'ANOMIE' is in direct violation of copyright law. The remedies available under the U.S. Copyright Act and the Digital Millennium Copyright Act are severe, including injunctive relief, payment of statutorily-prescribed damages, and reimbursement of attorney's fees. If you do not immediately remove the links to the copyrighted material and notify us that you have done so, we will promptly pursue legal action. We require the links to the copyrighted material to be removed from your website, and expect a response within no more than 2 days. Thank you for your immediate action on this matter. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[REDACTED]
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: n/a
Type of infringing material: Tweets
Specific Tweets: http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889878749356032
http://twitter.com/rockmetalbrasil/status/89889875616219136
512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: The information in this notification is accurate, and I state under penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.

Signature: [redacted]
